party.name: Brightcast LLC
party.address: 2699 Pacific Coast Highway, Suite 200, Hermosa Beach, CA 90254

offerAndAcceptance.offer: The parties acknowledge that they have reached a meeting of the minds regarding the terms governing the provision of services and payment.
offerAndAcceptance.acceptance: Both parties mutually consent to the terms outlined in this Agreement.
offerAndAcceptance.meetingOfMinds: Both parties intend to be legally bound by the terms and conditions of this Agreement.

consideration.description: The consideration for this Agreement shall be the revenue generated from ad spends, specifically consisting of 85% of Paid Search Revenues.

contract.intentionToCreateLegalRelations: Both parties intend to be legally bound by the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
contract.legalityOfPurpose: The purpose of this Agreement is to engage the Company in media buying services in a legal manner.

certaintyOfTerms.subjectMatter: The subject matter of this Agreement is the media buying services as described herein.
certaintyOfTerms.price: Fees shall be calculated as 85% of revenues.
certaintyOfTerms.timeForPerformance: Performance shall commence upon acceptance of this Agreement and continue until terminated by either party in accordance with the conditions herein.

contract.consent: Both parties mutually consent to the terms outlined in this Agreement.
contract.formAndFormalities: This Agreement is documented in writing and signed by both parties.

durationAndTermination.duration: The Agreement shall be indefinite until terminated by either party with a 30 days' notice.
durationAndTermination.terminationConditions: Either party may terminate this Agreement without cause by providing written notice.

contract.representationsAndWarranties: BRIGHTCAST represents that it owns the necessary intellectual property to utilize the platform relevant to this Agreement.
contract.indemnification: Each party agrees to indemnify the other from claims arising from their respective acts or omissions.

disputeResolution.method: Any disputes shall be settled through negotiation, and if unresolved, shall proceed to mediation.
disputeResolution.details: Each party shall designate representatives to resolve disputes informally.

contract.severability: If any provision of this Agreement is found to be unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.
contract.forceMajeure: Neither party shall be liable for delays or failure to perform due to causes beyond their reasonable control.
contract.confidentiality: Both parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of all proprietary information exchanged during the course of this Agreement.
contract.assignmentAndDelegation: Neither party may assign or delegate their obligations under this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
